text:
@NYGovCuomo US may become next centre of coronavirus pandemic, says WHO https://t.co/Vk6UJaz46B
India’s PM announces “total lockdown” of 1.3 billion people. Just 6 states ( CA, WA, OR, IL, NY, NM ) on lockdown while #trump earned 6th deferment for not going war on #Covid19
